data.1: SENT NOAH to his people to warn them before the painful punishment came upon them.
data.2: He said: "O my people, I warn you clearly
data.3: That you should worship God and fear Him, and follow me
data.4: That He may forgive some of your sins and prolong your term till an appointed time. Surely when God´s appointed time is come it will not be put off, if only you knew!
data.5: He said: "O Lord, I called my people night and day,
data.6: But the more I called, they only ran the farther away.
data.7: And every time I called them that You may forgive them, they thrust their fingers into their ears, and covered themselves with their garments, and became wayward, and behaved with downright insolence.
data.8: Then I called them loudly and more openly,
data.9: And declared to them in public and in private,
data.10: And I told them: ´Ask your Lord to forgive you. He is verily forgiving.
data.11: He will send you abundant rain from the sky,
data.12: And will give you increase of wealth and sons, and give you gardens and springs of water.
data.13: What has come upon you that you do not fear the majesty of God,
data.14: Knowing that He has created you by various stages?
data.15: Do you not see how God has fashioned seven skies one above the other,
data.16: And has placed the moon therein, an illumination, and has placed the sun, a lighted lamp?
data.17: God produced you from the earth like a vegetable growth;
data.18: He will then return you back to it, and bring you out again.
data.19: God has made the earth for you a spreading,
data.20: So that you may walk upon its spacious paths.´
data.21: But they did not listen to me," Noah said, "and followed him whose wealth and children only added to his ruin.
data.22: And they contrived a plot of great magnitude,
data.23: And said: ´Do not abandon your gods, and do not abandon Wadda or Suwa´, or Yaghuth, Ya´uq or Nasr.´
data.24: And they misled many. So do not give the evil-doers increase but in error.
data.25: They were drowned because of their habitual sinfulness, and sent to Hell, and did not find any helper other than God.
data.26: Noah said: "O Lord, do not leave a single habitation of unbelievers on the earth.
data.27: If you leave them, they will lead Your creatures astray, and beget but iniquitous and ungrateful offspring.
data.28: O Lord, forgive me, my parents, and any one who enters my house as a believer, and all believing men and women, and do not give the evil-doers increase save in ruin.
